column5: well had to do some fishing So loaded up the boat and headed for the Kawarthas must be bass opener, 7am the  the ramp is packed the parking is full and the road with the no parking sign.   Full I squeezed in and off I went. I got one on and thought it was a fat little pike but when I went to remove the hooks in the water I saw it was a muskie,  I grabbed the camera but as things go ,it finished getting off before I could snap the photo.  I did a lot of   rip jigging but not a bite  tried a worm harness with a plastic worm and that was the ticket  I got 5 of them , nothing big but it was great to get out  sorry pictures aren't much but here they are           the folding boat does ok, but I will be happy when thry deliver the new boat  new date is june 22
At least you were able to get out and get a few. Next, Simcoe bass opener!!!Same day your boat arrives.  .Hopefully!!. That folding boat looks cool!!,can't say I ever seen one.

I know I said lets get out ,,,,,,IF, But i was on call,SO,,,,,,,,,,,,,,You made a day of it. Missed a nice day on the water with ya,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,Oh wait,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,, HERE IT COMES,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,  While getting a cup of java this AM,I seen an Avenger with a nice 16ft tiller with a 30hp pull into the lot..I said no way,,,,,,,,,oh ya,yes way,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,, Got to talking.,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,Toung weight,pulling,launching,pulling it out,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,, It all sounded good to me,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,   Now Im talking to meself ,To talk meself ,into it .   Sorry,you said you had a musky?????????????? Only took you 2 years. And you need a camera man.LOL

well there you go   buy yer self a boat there boy  it  was great to get out if if if I have the boat next weekend I guess I will be putting all the toys on it might just put the electric motor on it and hit the river for bass opener
Flipping for greens,with you,,,,,I,ll make an excuse.  Wonder if the new boat,will have the same luck as catching at the back of the boat?
how do you like that dock at the launch? Was there last week...nearly flipped me right into the water!
yeah it tipped on me too
I sure do like that folding boat it would have come in handy when I lived up north. Nice start to the season on the water Terry
Very nice Terry, glad you got out, I'm not brave enough to even try to head out on opening day...  Maureen
Who needs a lund when you have a porta boat! Good fishin! Those eyes look tasty!

Rippin Terr !!!  Rippin' eyes!  I'm with Shane cause once you get that Lund with all it's fancy shmancy toys and comforts, you'll get soft man and the fishing will come tough to ya.  Just sayin'. lol.
if they change the date again, it just might be , forget the lund and trick out the port a boat
